---
title: 'ps'
description: "List running Xorq servers"
---

List running Xorq processes (e.g. servers started with `serve-flight-udxf` or `serve-unbound`). Reads server state from the cache directory.

## Usage

Run with no arguments to list running Xorq servers.

```bash
xorq ps [OPTIONS]
```

## Options

Optional override for where server state is stored.

| Option | Default | Description |
|--------|---------|-------------|
| `--cache-dir` | (system cache) | Directory where server state records are stored |

## Example

List running servers.

```bash
xorq ps
```
